configuration.name: accountId
configuration.title: Account ID
configuration.description: Account ID to be associated with the query

configuration.name: metric
configuration.title: Metric
configuration.description: Select either bytes sent or bytes received

configuration.name: autoZoom
configuration.title: Auto zoom/pan
configuration.description: Automatically zoom and pan the map to fit the queried countries

configuration.name: initialLat
configuration.title: Initial Latitude
configuration.description: The Initial latitude center of the map

configuration.name: initialLng
configuration.title: Initial Longitude
configuration.description: The Initial longitude center of the map

configuration.name: initialZoom
configuration.title: Initial Zoom
configuration.description: The Initial zoom level of the map (0-18)

configuration.name: showTable
configuration.title: Show data table
configuration.description: Show the chart data in a table
